snippet: The Opera Orchestra of New York performed “Rienzi,” Wagner’s seldom-seen third opera, at Avery Fisher Hall on Sunday afternoon.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews concert performance of Richard Wagner opera Rienzi by the Opera Orchestra of New York at Avery Fisher Hall.
lead_paragraph: The Opera Orchestra of New York performed “Rienzi,” Wagner’s seldom-seen third opera, at Avery Fisher Hall on Sunday afternoon.

headline.seo: Wagner’s ‘Rienzi’ From Opera Orchestra at Avery Fisher Hall
headline.main: An Early Wagner, but With All the Trademark Bells and Whistles
headline.print_headline: An Early Wagner, but With All the Trademark Bells and Whistles
